resources.string: Who would you like me to nudge?
What should I say when I nudge them?
How often should I nudge them?
If Nudge has simplified your life in any way, please consider helping fund my next whiskey purchase buy making a contribution below:

Nudge used to have a very ugly icon. Without Joey\'s help, this app wouldn\'t look half as good as it does now. Whether the icon itself or the color style, Joey\'s insight helped give Nudge some personality. So even if you find the functionality itself mediocre, please consider making a contribution to Joey so he can make more awesome icons in the future!
Press this button start creating your first Nudge!
Press this button to select a recipient from your contact list.Tap the black area to continue.
Choose a Send Date and Time
Nudge starts sending your messages at this date and time.Tap the black area to begin creating a message!
